name: pathways
description: A WebXR game for js13k 2020 game jam

scripts.html-minify: mkdir -p dist; node node_modules/html-minifier/cli.js --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype index.html > dist/index.html
